channel.title: Questions concerning the Slave Bot Alternative *update by mx1000/DJarn0/pelle to
channel.description:
I have some questions concerning the Slave Bot Alternative *update by mx1000/DJarn0/pelle to 373* .
1.) Is this less detectable than normal Aryan?
2.) Can and if so, how can you run it with a proxy.
3.) Does it take up less computer usuage than normal Aryan, therefore you can run more?
**If anyone has the answers to these questions please post it by #. Thank you very much and I hope this helps others also.**

item.title: Questions concerning the Slave Bot Alternative *update by mx1000/DJarn0/pelle to
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“BAsh, post:2, topic:1550”]1#. No it is just a cosmetic user interface.
2#. You can implement proxys like any other Aryan, pass commandline data through the shortcut - just add it on the end of the traget string.
3#. It should use less computer usage as you no longer have to run a console window. For even better performance, select the script tab when u minimise it. = More bots!!![/quote]
wrong bring up 2 aryan normal and your attempt at copying my features.

Read full topic
item.source: Questions concerning the Slave Bot Alternative *update by mx1000/DJarn0/pelle to

item.title: Questions concerning the Slave Bot Alternative *update by mx1000/DJarn0/pelle to
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

1#. No it is just a cosmetic user interface.
2#. You can implement proxys like any other Aryan, pass commandline data through the shortcut - just add it on the end of the traget string.
3#. It should use less computer usage as you no longer have to run a console window. For even better performance, select the script tab when u minimise it. = More bots!!!

Read full topic
